channel.title: Invisible weapons..?
channel.description: For some reason a few of the weapons in my server are invisible when you equip them.. Would that just be a client problem? If so where about would I go to fix it? Sorry it's been a long time since I had a server, so im trying to re-learn alot of stuff..

item.title: Invisible weapons..?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your client is missing models for the weapons. So yes, it’s the client. You need to get the proper models for what ever weapons are messed up

Read full topic
